titleStmt.title: SII 7.55: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 55. (A.R. No. 52 of 1900). ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE FIRST PRAKARA OF THE VIJAYARAGHAVA-PERUMAL TEMPLE AT TIRUPPUKKULI, SAME TALUK AND DISTRICT.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrīḥ . grāmādāmunitaṇṭalāT prathamadiśyā hiṁgukagrāmataḥ pratyak·diśyatha sindhutoyanadadiśyāvegavatyāstataḥ . yāmyāyāndiśi bhūramācavaḷava
grāmāT paṭugrāmataḥ praādādāhavapuṁgavāya vijayī śrīvīracaMpeśvaraḥ . koccaṭakopapatmarāṉa tribhu vaṉaccakravattikaḷ śrīvikramapāṇḍyadevaṟku yāṇ
ṭu Eṭṭaāvatu kaṉṉināyaṟṟu pūrvvapakṣattu tritiyaiyum veḷḷikkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa Āyiliyattu nāḷ jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattup paṭuvūṟ
koṭṭattup paṭuvūrāṉa vīracampanallūr kiḻpāṟkellai muṉikaḷ taṇṭalattār Ellaikku meṟkum teṉpāṟkellai vaḷavanallūrār Ellaikku vaṭakkum
melpāṟkellai peruṅkāyanallūrār Ellaikku kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai veḵkāvāṟṟukku teṟkum Āka Innāṟpāṟkellaikkum naṭuvuṭpaṭṭa nilattil Iṟai
yili tevatāṉam tiruviṭaiyāṭṭam paḷḷiccantam muḷḷiṭṭanilaṅkaḷ nikki nikkiyuḷḷa naṉcey puṉcey nilattu kaṭamai Āyam poṉvari kutiraivari pala kāṇikkai puṟakka
laṉai taṟiIṟai taṭṭārppāṭṭam cekkukkaṭamai Iṉavari Erimiṉpāṭṭam Irunatuparimāṟuvārperiṟkaṭamai maṟṟum Eppeṟpaṭṭa Aṉaittuvarikaḷum Inta toṇ
ṭaimaṇṭalattut tāmaṟkoṭṭattut tāmarnāṭṭut tiruppati tiruppuṭkuḻi Emperumāḷ vijayarāghavapperumāḷukku nām nammuṭaiya nakṣatramāṉa Āyiliyattile tir
tthamākak kaṇṭa Āvaṇittirunāḷukku tirunāḷpaṭikkum nāṅ kaṇṭa viracampaṉsandhikku Amutupaṭi kalaAricikkum Itukku veṇṭum kaṟiviñcaṉaṅkaḷukkum tiruppavitrattukkum
periyatirumañcaṉattukkum veṇṭuvaṉa candrādittavaraikkum celvatākac cilālekaiyum tāmraśāsanamum paṇṇikkuṭutteṉ campukulottuṅkaṉ campuvarāyaṉ
viracampaṉeṉ . campaścaMpukulot=tuṁgassārvvabhaumassabhāpatiḥ . bhrātṛbhissaha rājyastho vibhātyācandratārakaM .
Digital edition of SII 7.55 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
